attributes.action: Stop flight price hikes in school holidays.
attributes.additional_details: The government need to intervene and stop this happening.
attributes.background: Look at price increases during school holidays, keep an eye on what the flight companies are doing and how they are exploiting families and educational workers. The price hikes during this time are excessive and making it extremely difficult for families to have holiday time together.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about prices for holidays are a matter for travel agents and airlines, not the UK Government or Parliament.
